alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Central Middlesex County; Dukes; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Northern Bristol; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 3:31PM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of eastern Massachusetts and southeast Rhode Island. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult after midnight and will impact the Tuesday morning commute. Rising temperatures and lighter snow will result in road conditions improving Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow develops between 10 pm and 1 am. The heaviest snow and lowest visibility occurs after midnight. Snow continues through the day on Tuesday at a lighter intensity and may mix with or change to rain near the coast Tuesday afternoon. Little additional accumulation is expected after mid morning near the coast with minor additional accumulations possible inch further inland.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
